data.title: AudioCoder 0.8.46 (MediaCoder Audio Edition) Download
data.meta_description: Safe download AudioCoder 0.8.46 latest version : Universal audio transoding tool with essential options related with audio transcoding.
data.text:
AudioCoder 0.8.46 Build 5866

AudioCoder (MediaCoder Audio Edition) is a universal audio transoding tool with essential options related with audio transcoding. It supports most popular audio formats and can convert from both video and audio files as well as directly from network streams, DVD, CD. On multi-core processors, it can processes up to 8 transcoding sessions at the same time to significantly improve transcoding speed and thus shortern the time needed to have your audio files encoded. It integrates many codecs and tools into all-in-one software. It decodes all popular formats of audio files as well as audio streams in video files and encodes them with all its supported audio encoders.

AudioCoder fully supports MP3, Vorbis, LC-AAC, HE-AAC, Opus, AC-3, MPEG Audio, MusePack, Speex, AMR, Windows Media Audio, ADPCM, FLAC, WavPack, Monkey's Audio, OptimFrog, ALAC, TTA, PCM.

Integrated Audio Codecs: LAME MP3, OggEnc (Vorbis Encoder), Nero AAC Encoder, QAAC (using Apple's CoreAAC encoding engine), CT AAC+ Encoder, Opus Audio Encoder, FAAC, Enhanced 3GGP AAC+ Encoder, Helix MP3 Encoder, MusePack SV8 Encoder, Speex Encoder, WavPack Encoder, FLAC Encoder, Monkey's Audio Codec 4.0, TTA Encoder, OptimFrog Encoder, MPEG-4 Lossless Encoder.

AudioCoder Interface

Latest version: 0.8.46 Build 5866 (02 Oct 2016)

License: Freeware

System requirements: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10

Download AudioCoder 64-bit: AudioCoder-x64-0.8.46.exe (28.0 MB)

Download AudioCoder 32-bit: AudioCoder-0.8.46.exe (29.5 MB)
